content: SPX-L masonry core bit Ultimate core bit for coring in all types of masonry – for <2.5 kW tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti Equidist technology (above 1 3/8 diameter) – precisely positioned diamonds for unmatched drilling performance and constant drilling speeds over the entire life of the core bit Unique Hilti X-Change module system (2 to 10 diameter) enables easy core removal, fast stuck core bit recovery and on-site retipping using just a flat-tip screwdriver Save significant space and weight by replacing traditional core bits with a single barrel and multiple modules (X-Change module) Applications Hand-held coring in all types of masonry (dry drilling) and light concrete (wet drilling) ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: DD 110-D, DD 110-W, DD 130, DD 150-U Base materials: Masonry Drilling Mode: Hand-held, Rig-mounted Technical Data | For use with | DD 110-D, DD 110-W, DD 130, DD 150-U | Base materials | Masonry | Drilling Mode | Hand-held, Rig-mounted | Wet or dry operation | Dry | X-Change module | Yes (2-8) | Laser welded segments | Yes | Connection end | BI (Hilti), BS (1-1/4 in), BT (5/8 in) | Segment height | 8 mm ### ITEMS- 3872431 -
